Package de.dfki.lt.freetts.mbrola

Provides engine support for MBROLA voices See:
          Description

Class Summary
MbrolaAudioOutput Supports generating audio output from an MBROLA-synthesized utterance.
MbrolaCaller Calls external MBROLA binary to synthesise the utterance.
ParametersToMbrolaConverter Utterance processor converting phoneme timing and f0-time targets into MBROLA format.
 

Package de.dfki.lt.freetts.mbrola Description

Provides engine support for MBROLA voices
